channel.title: Admin Help
channel.description:
I am a noobie coder, :| and i need help making myself an admin, i am using Pimpscape source and i have tried changing my permissions on my account from the folder but it hasnt worked,
Please help me! :D
Karl
also if you can add me at:
karlosscape@hotmail.co.uk
thnx peeps :cool:

item.title: Admin Help
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

u go into characters. then find the person u want to make admin. click into them and ull c something that says player right = 0 change it to either.

  1. Mod
  2. Admin
  3. Owner (Also owner)

helped u?

Read full topic
